srcALL filter({Professional status}!='Self-employed/ freelancer') ~> FilterProfessionalStatus
FilterProfessionalStatus select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Professional status},
		{BSO ownership},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		Website,
		Twitter,
		LinkedIn,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		Region,
		Postalcode,
		Cityregion,
		{Name of the entity},
		{Account Name},
		{Office Address: Country},
		Category,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		{Office Address: State/Province},
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Street 1},
		{Mailing Address: Street 2},
		{Mailing Address: City},
		{Mailing Address: State/Province},
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		{Mailing Address: Country},
		{UN Mailing Format},
		Account,
		Phone,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqCol
SelectReqCol derive(ENTITY_NAME = case(isNull({Organization/ Company name})==false(),
     {Organization/ Company name},
     isNull({Name of the entity})==false(),
     {Name of the entity},
     isNull(Account)==false(),
     Account,
     isNull({Account Name})==false(),
     {Account},
     ''),
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME = substring(Email, instr(Email, '@')+1),
		ADDRESS = case(isNull(Address)==false(),
     Address,
     isNull({Office Address})==false(),
     {Office Address},
     isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
     {Office Address: Street 1},
     ''),
		CITY = case(isNull(City)==false(),
     City,
     isNull(Cityname)==false(),
     Cityname,
     isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
     {Office Address: City},
     ''),
		REGION = Region,
		PHONE_NUMBER = {Phone number},
		WEBSITE = Website,
		TWITTER = Twitter,
		LINKEDIN = LinkedIn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP = {BSO ownership},
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
     {Post Code},
     isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
     Postalcode,
     isNull({Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code})==false(),
     {Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
     ''),
		POBOX = {Office Address: Street 2},
		CITY_REGION = case(isNull(Cityregion)==false(),
     Cityregion,
     isNull({Office Address: State/Province})==false(),
     {Office Address: State/Province},
     ''),
		CATEGORY = Category,
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1 = {Mailing Address: Street 1},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2 = {Mailing Address: Street 2},
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY = {Mailing Address: City},
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE = {Mailing Address: State/Province},
		MAILING_POST_CODE = {Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code},
		MAILING_COUNTRY = {Mailing Address: Country},
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN = {UN Mailing Format}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		ENTITY_NAME,
		ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
		ADDRESS = DerivedColumn1@ADDRESS,
		CITY = DerivedColumn1@CITY,
		REGION = DerivedColumn1@REGION,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		WEBSITE = DerivedColumn1@WEBSITE,
		TWITTER = DerivedColumn1@TWITTER,
		LINKEDIN = DerivedColumn1@LINKEDIN,
		SOURCE,
		BSO_OWNERSHIP,
		POST_CODE,
		POBOX,
		CITY_REGION,
		CATEGORY = DerivedColumn1@CATEGORY,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedColumn1@CONFIDENTIAL,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
		MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
		MAILING_POST_CODE,
		MAILING_COUNTRY,
		MAILING_FORMAT_UN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIM
SelectDIM aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
AggDistinct derive(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> SourceHASHRecords
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestRecord
ExistingDIM, LatestRecord join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestRecord@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestRecord@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(EXISTING_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ENTITY_EMAIL_DOMAIN_NAME,
ADDRESS,
CITY,
REGION,
PHONE_NUMBER,
WEBSITE,
TWITTER,
LINKEDIN,
SOURCE,
BSO_OWNERSHIP,
POST_CODE,
POBOX,
CITY_REGION,
CATEGORY,
CONFIDENTIAL,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
OTHER_EMAILS,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET1,
MAILING_ADDRESS_STREET2,
MAILING_ADDRESS_CITY,
MAILING_STATE_PROVICE,
MAILING_POST_CODE,
MAILING_COUNTRY,
MAILING_FORMAT_UN)) ~> ExitingHASHRecords
SourceHASHRecords, SelectExiting exists(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD == EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, SelectExiting lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
ExitingHASHRecords select(mapColumn(
		EXISTING_ENTITY_SR_KEY = ENTITY_SR_KEY,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXISTING_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
		EXISTING_ENTITY_NAME = ENTITY_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExiting
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXISTING_ENTITY_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord derive(VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXISTING_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2

SelectReqCol derive(ProjectID = case(isNull(ProjectID)==false(),
     ProjectID,
     isNull({Project Number})==false(),
     {Project Number},
     'N/A'),
		{Type of event} = case(isNull({Type of event})==false(),
     {Type of event},
     isNull({Event type})==false(),
     {Event type},
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && trim({Event type})=='ITC-Corporate',
     'ITC corporate event',
     'N/A'),
		{Type of platform} = case(isNull({Type of platform})==false(),
     {Type of platform},
     isNull({Type of tool})==false(),
     {Type of tool},
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && isNull(SheTrades)==false(),
     'SheTrades',
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && isNull({SME Trade Academy})==false(),
     'SME Trade Academy',
     'N/A'),
		PARTICIPANT_ID = case(isNull(Email)==false(),
     Email,
     concat({First name}, {Last name},Gender,{Year of birth})
     ),
		{Date of data collection New} = case(isNull({Date of data collection})==false(),
     {Date of data collection},
     isNull({Registration Date})==false(),          
{Registration Date},
     ''),
		{Country of Residence} = case(instr(FILE_NAME, 'WEDF 2018') > 0, 
{Country of Residence}, 
Country
),
		{Date of birth} = case(isNull({Date of birth})==false(),
     {Date of birth},
     isNull({Date of birth2})==false(),
     {Date of birth2},
     ''),
		ENTITY_NAME = case(isNull({Organization/ Company name})==false(),
     {Organization/ Company name},
     isNull({Name of the entity})==false(),
     {Name of the entity},
     isNull(Account)==false(),
     Account,
     isNull({Account Name})==false(),
     Account,
     ''),
		{Type of entity} = case(isNull({Type of entity})==false(),
     {Type of entity},
     isNull({Account Type})==false(),
     {Account Type},
     'N/A'),
		{Sub-type of entity} = case(isNull({Sub-type of entity})==false(),
      {Sub-type of entity},
     isNull({Account Sub-Type})==false(),
     {Sub-type of entity},
     'N/A'),
		ENTITY_COUNTRY = case(isNull(Country)==false(),
    Country,
     isNull({Office Address: Country})==false(),          
     {Office Address: Country},
     ''),
		{Service theme 1} = case(isNull({Service themes})==false(),
    {Service themes},
     isNull({Service theme 1})==false(),          
     {Service theme 1},
     ''),
		HS_CODE = case(isNull(HS)==false(),
    HS,
     isNull({HS 6 digit code (if available)})==false(),          
     {HS 6 digit code (if available)},
     ''),
		ISIC_CODE = case(isNull(ISIC)==false(),
    ISIC,
     isNull({ISIC code division})==false(),          
     {ISIC code division},
     ''),
		AGE_GROUP = case(isNull({Date of data collection})==false(),
           minus(year(toDate({Date of data collection}, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toInteger({Year of birth})),
     isNull({Registration Date})==false(),          
           minus(year(toDate({Registration Date}, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),toInteger({Year of birth})),
     0),
		YOUTH_MANAGED_FLAG = case(isNull({Youth Managed})== false(),
        (case(upper({Youth Managed})=='YES',
         'Y',
        upper({Youth Managed})=='NO',
         'N')
         ),
      isNull({Owner/ top manager age})== false(),
        (case(toInteger({Owner/ top manager age}) <= 35,
         'Y',

source(output(

	),

SrcNTF select(mapColumn(

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumn
SelectColumn aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_NAME),
	each(match(name!='ENTITY_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> DistinctByAggregate
DistinctByAggregate derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ENTITY_NAME,
ADDRESS,
FIRM_ID
)) ~> SourceRecordHash
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_ENTITY_ID = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_ENTITY_NAME = ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME,
		EXIST_ADDRESS = ADDRESS,
		EXIST_FIRM_ID = FIRM_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExistingCol
SelectExistingCol derive(RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
EXIST_ADDRESS,
EXIST_FIRM_ID
)) ~> ExstingRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExstingRecordHash exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, ExstingRecordHash lookup(ENTITY_NAME == EXIST_ENTITY_NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXIST_ENTITY_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
SurrogateKey1 derive(ENTITY_ID = MAX_VAL+Dim_Surrogate_Key,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXIST_VERSION_NO +1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
RunInfo2 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID,
		ENTITY_NAME),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestEntityID
ExistingDIM, LatestEntityID join(ExistingDIM@ENTITY_ID == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@ENTITY_NAME == LatestEntityID@ENTITY_NAME
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestEntityID@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join2 keyGenerate(output(Dim_Surrogate_Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord, ExitingDimMaxID join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
